content: {"name": "Tzu-Chi Foundation Long Island", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please register via the link to receive food. https://tinyurl.com/TCLIFoodPantry\nTzu Chi Long Island Branch is providing biweekly food distribution every second and fourth Saturday of every month.  Except for January and February when we only offer food distribution once because of the cold weather. The rest of 10 months are done twice, second and forth Saturday from 9:30 AM to 12:00 PM.", "email": "", "url": "https://tzuchi.us/events/long-island-biweekly-food-pantry-2025?i=88b9f07", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "60 East Williston Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "East Williston", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11596", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7581383, "longitude": -73.6342628}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 660-9229", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}]}
